name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MeetGeek: AI meeting summaries and transcription

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock AI-powered meeting efficiency with transcriptions, summaries, and notes for Zoom, Google Meet, and Teams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MeetGeek transforms online meetings with AI-powered efficiency. Say goodbye to manual note-taking and hello to seamless integration across Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams!

Using MeetGeek Chrome Extension is FREE. Here‚Äôs how to enable it:

- Download the extension and click on the icon to add it to your browser bar
- Click on MeetGeek‚Äôs logo on your browser extensions bar and log in to or sign up for an account

From here, the MeetGeek note-taker will join your meetings and provide you with a quick access control panel where you can:
üåé Customise upcoming meetings to edit the preferred language and meeting templates for a tailored experience
ü™¢ Invite the notetaker directly into your Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams calls - all without ever leaving the platform
üìÇ Browse into your recent meeting notes and summaries from past conversations
‚è∏Ô∏è Pause or resume the meeting recording and note-taking at a distance of a click

Customize your experience, easily access meeting histories, and dive deeper with the MeetGeek web app for advanced features like:
- Automated follow-ups - Automate meeting follow-ups, ensuring action items and key points are communicated to all participants without delay
- Insightful analytics - Get insights into meeting trends, participant engagement, and productivity metrics with our analytics dashboard
- Detailed AI transcripts & summaries - Dive into every detail with AI-generated transcripts and summaries, capturing your meetings with precision
- Custom automation - Tailor your meeting experience with custom automation, setting up personalized workflows that suit your needs (2000+ apps through Zapier)
- Seamless sharing & collaboration - Share meeting outcomes and highlights to foster collaboration and ensure your team stays aligned and informed

üîí MeetGeek secures powerful data encryption, GDPR compliance, and SOC2 Type 2 certification - you can read more about it here https://meetgeek.ai/security

Streamline your workflow and turn every meeting into a productivity powerhouse. Get started with MeetGeek today and transform your online collaborations - a free plan is available!
